author: Malavida.com
title: Facebook Messenger 102.0 English iPhone
text:
Antony Peel 7 / 10 
With Facebook Messenger you can send messages and take part in group chats with your Facebook friends . Get hold of the official Facebook chat application. 
Facebook chat on your iPhone. Features of Facebook Messenger for iPhone 
The basic function of Facebook Messenger is to send messages to Facebook contacts. Some of the noteworthy features of the application are: Control the application with gestures . Check which contacts are available. Organize your Favorites placing the friends you speak with most at the top. Enjoy the new design similar to WhatsApp . 
Download Facebook Messenger free for iPhone and enter Facebook's chat wherever you are and whenever you want. What's new in the latest version No changelog published. 
Requires iOS 8.0 or above. Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch and iPad. Antony Peel at Google +
